markdownRemark.html:
This is incredible - it is a cheap radio transmitter that is usable over thousands of miles. I can think of innumerable circumstances in India where such cheap technology could be invaluable.

Right from delivery of education, weather alerts to aiding security forces in dense jungles, there are a million possibilities.

frontmatter.title: Cheap radio communicates over thousands of miles
I'm doing a Reddit University online course: will any online university work?
